# How to Write Case Studies

Selection of a topic is the most crucial job when working on any case study. The amount of time consumed in choosing the topic of your interest and liking is a time consuming process. How can we make that job easier and write the case study, lets find that in this article.

Following are the key initial prepration points that one should consider before writing the case study:

### ***1. Case Studies Relevance***
It is important for any individual to be able to relate to the business that they are writing on.

---

### ***2. How a Case Study can Help in Understanding a Business***
A detailed information is what a case study provides of that business which you want to either work for or want to create.

---

### ***3. The Influence Case Studies Provide***
The impact of a cacse study depends on how much valuable information is provided in that study.
